name: file-extraction
title: Extract Files
description: Extracts all files with a given extension from a selected folder (including subfolders) into a new sibling folder at the same level as the selected folder.
author: emilbeh

commands.name: extract-copy
commands.title: Extract Copy
commands.description: Copies files into a new sibling folder. Originals stay.

commands.name: extract-move
commands.title: Extract Move
commands.description: Moves files into a new sibling folder. Originals are removed.

preferences.name: confirmLimit
preferences.title: Limit
preferences.description: The maximum number of files to be extracted at once. If the limit is exceeded, a confirmation dialog will appear.

preferences.name: excludeExtensions
preferences.title: Exclude Extensions
preferences.description: Comma-separated list of file extensions to ignore

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
